xboxlive_get_savedata_user.htm+html.head: xboxlive_get_savedata_user.htm+html.body.p:87-3
xboxlive_get_savedata_user: This function returns the user ID pointer currently associated with file saving (or the constant pointer_null if no user ID is currently being used). See xboxlive_set_savedata_user() for further details.

xboxlive_get_savedata_user.htm+html.head: xboxlive_get_savedata_user.htm+html.body.p:101-3
xboxlive_get_savedata_user: The above code checks to see if a user is currently assigned as the save target, and if they are not then they are assigned.
